results.name: Invert transform applied three times to Pascal's triangle A007318.
comment: Triangle T(n,k), 0 <= k <= n, read by rows, given by [1, 3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] DELTA [1, 3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, ...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Aug 10 2005
link: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2000
